name: Singstar Pop
description:
SingStar Popworld is the next must-have party-game in the best-selling SingStar range. It features another 30 great pop and rock classics from past and present for you to pit your singing skills against.

Compete through individual and team-based rounds as SingStar judges your performance - the better the performance, the more points you score. Take on the new Rap and Medley modes, and croon along to new tracks from top artists such as Beyonce, The Black Eyed Peas, Blink 182, Kylie Minogue, OutKast and Joss Stone.

Make your party the most talked about with the best selling SingStar range - each version comes with 30 top music tracks and original videos from superstars. Anyone can play in an instant - simply plug in the special SingStar mics (game available with or without mics if you already have some) and get ready to sing - the better you perform, the more points you'll be awarded!
